channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 08:12 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 08:12 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:03 Air alarm to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast follow the following messages.
